<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Request HR Access">4826f5da475412100a41fe02d16d43b7</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Making fields visible</name><order/><published_ref/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
   //g_form.setVisible('users_data','[{"requester":" true"},{"requested_for":" true"},{"id_number":" true"},{"phone_number":" true"}]');
   //g_form.setVisible("phone_number", true);

   var usersData = g_form.getLabelOf("users_data:53808112479012100a41fe02d16d432e");
   var objList = JSON.parse(usersData);

   
   g_form.setVisible(objList.id_number);

   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-08-30 19:58:41</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>4e3ffd96479412100a41fe02d16d43e1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Making fields visible</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="NowPro" source="x_295853_nowpro">c09c285a471012100a41fe02d16d4379</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NowPro">c09c285a471012100a41fe02d16d4379</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_4e3ffd96479412100a41fe02d16d43e1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-09-01 12:53:24</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><va_supported>true</va_supported><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
